text.text_translated: Suzanne Collines always felt sad about news of wars. She was a child. Her father was a pilot. He was in the US Air Force. He flew planes. He fought in Vietnam. Her mother tried to keep her safe. She did not tell Suzanne about the war. But Suzanne still saw news about the war. She knew her dad was there. It was a very scary time for her.
